 I have two Yorkie attack dogs, and a toy poodle. Like I've always said, C=
hris is a good guy in person, it's all this wierdness I hear, even from his=
 blogs, that torques my jaws.  
 
 Frank-S

Taking a bodyguard or glock?Lance--- I=
n EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > Tha=
nks!!! Chris wants to meets Saturday, but I am uncertain of the purpose. I =
don't/won't endorse anyone or anything as being the onlyest one. > > Frank>=
 > > To: EVP-ITC@...: lisby@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 18:45:31 +0000Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: I don't know about that!!> > > > > --- In EVP-ITC@...=
m, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@> wrote:>> Let's not twist words here. Show me wher=
e Chris has said you "only"> get false communication or bad guys. > BTW I t=
hought we were trying to get the negativity behind us and move> on to const=
ructive discussion. Guess that's more of the wishy-washy> depends on what m=
y hair feels like doing ways here. from his own blog (clipped, but not othe=
rwise altered):"Wednesday, November 28, 2007The Box has hit the fan!Current=
 mood: distressed"I have recentlybeen made aware that there are several rep=
lica versions of thisdevice being sold. I have also been told of another de=
vice that canbe purchased for very little from any electronics merchant and=
altered by hand, producing what some consider to be results. As Iexpected, =
the samples that people have sent me are *nothing morethan timed radio scan=
s that have no validity.* [emphasis mine]"These new "radio scanners" are no=
t only *a waste of money* forpeople looking to do research with them in hop=
es of havingeffective communication with the other side, but may in fact be=
 *verydangerous*. Should demonic and other negative entities learn to useth=
ese falsedevices, *the results could be devastating.*"...The Catholic Churc=
h ... predicted the widespread sale of*false communication devices* as far =
back as last year. *I have recentlybegun to receive requests from individua=
ls asking for help to closenegative doorways and portals that they believe =
they opened usingtheir purchased Telephone to the Dead replica*. Others are=
 claiming> that I am a fraud because their purchased device doesn't produce=
the positive results I have been fortunate enough to have."So let's go thro=
ug this again:*nothing more than timed radio scans that have no validity.**=
a waste of money**very dangerous**the results could be devastating.**false =
communication devices**I have recently begun to receive requests from indiv=
iduals asking forhelp to close negative doorways and portals that they beli=
eve theyopened using their purchased Telephone to the Dead replica.*As you =
see, there are two statements that Chris is making--so much forhe's always =
consistant, which I believe was an earlier statement thatyou made.1. The ne=
w boxes create accidental timed radio scans only.2. The new boxes are very =
dangerous because they draw negative results.I'm not sure how the two state=
ments can stand together, but in eithercase, his opinion is clearly not com=
plimentary toward the rest of thebox users besides the four of the 30 he sa=
ys, in the same post, "havebeen identified."Rather cheeky and insulting and=
 wrong, HMO. But if he just goes ondoing sessions like the one APSR recorde=
d, I will continue to laud them.Ann > > > > > > > _________________________=
